description: A resource that should be exposed on the API server.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object metadata. The name MUST be in the format `"<.spec.names.plural>.<.spec.group>"`. The `namespace` must be specified. The `clusterName`, if specified, must be a valid DNS label.

spec.description: How the user wants the resources to appear

status.description: The actual state of the CustomResourceDefinition
